description: This file configures the Angular application by setting up application-wide providers including zone change detection, routing, and client-side hydration with event replay.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular's zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up Angular routing with the routes imported from 'app.routes'.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay, improving Angular app hydration performance.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay for hydration to prevent event loss during server-side rendering hydration.
